price: Àwọn ènìyàn (Ànábì) Nūh, àwọn ènìyàn Rass àti àwọn (ènìyàn) Thamūd pe òdodo ní irọ́ ṣíwájú wọn.
arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحٖ وَأَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلرَّسِّ وَثَمُودُ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: kadhabat qablahum qawmu nūḥin wa-aṣḥābu al-rasi wathamūdu
